text: Hyperaspis dissoluta, the dissolute lady beetle, is a species of lady beetles in the family Coccinellidae. It is found in North America. ==Subspecies== * Hyperaspis dissoluta dissoluta Crotch, 1873 * Hyperaspis dissoluta nevadica Casey, 1899 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Coccinellidae Category:Beetles described in 1873
title: Hyperaspis dissoluta
